## Conditioned interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

An object can implement Conditioned if it has a set of conditions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Conditioned 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [conditions](./stentor-models.conditioned.conditions.md) | [Conditions](./stentor-models.conditions.md) \| string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Conditions to be met.<!-- -->Can either be a Conditions object or a string such as "foo('bar') \|\| false" |
